page.title: 09RECREATION-ADULTS
page.content: Adults in our area take part in a number of leisure time activities. At, or near, home their interests are cross-country running, gardening, badminton, dyking, crook-making, shooting, carpet bowling and sewing. Some woman attend meetings of the Gelston branch of the Scottish Womens Rural Institute, where there are demonstrations on cooking and handicrafts, talks on the work of different organisations, and competitions to enter. In Castle Douglas, about five kilometres from Gelston, classes attended are keep-fit,yoga and cookery. Other sports are sailing, golf, squash and green bowling. In winter some people travel fifty kilometres to curl at Lockerbie Ice Rink.
